scripts.test: node test/setup.js && pnpm test:dev && pnpm test:build
scripts.test:dev: node -e "fs.rmSync('test/errors.json', { force: true })" && cross-env DEV=true playwright test
scripts.test:build: node -e "fs.rmSync('test/errors.json', { force: true })" && cross-env PUBLIC_PRERENDERING=false playwright test
scripts.test:cross-platform:dev: node test/setup.js && node -e "fs.rmSync('test/errors.json', { force: true })" && cross-env DEV=true playwright test test/cross-platform/
scripts.test:cross-platform:build: node test/setup.js && node -e "fs.rmSync('test/errors.json', { force: true })" && playwright test test/cross-platform/
